name: password-character-picker
description: Splits a given password into individual characters. A button is provided for each character, which when clicked, copies that character to the clipboard. Useful for those 'enter nth character of your password' security prompts of certain sites.
author: Dan Stevens <dan.stevens@doomy.co.uk>

preferences.name: maskPhraseInput
preferences.title: Mask Input Phrase
preferences.description: If set to true, the contents of the 'Enter Phrase' input will be masked.

preferences.name: maskButtons
preferences.title: Mask Text of Character Buttons
preferences.description: If set to true, the text within password character buttons be masked.
